full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SKABS BRGYAD PA'I MTHA' DPYOD 'KHRUL SEL GANGG'A'I CHU RGYUN MA PHAM ZHAL LUNGS BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @076A *, ,(CES 'KHRUL SEL GANGGA'I CHU RGYUN MI PHAM ZHAL LUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, DGE BSHES SHES RAB KYI TSOGS SU 'PHRIN LAS 'BEL GTAM CUNG ZAD BYAS PAR BRTEN NAS, ,GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA SKAL LDAN BLO BZANG DANG, ,DKA' CHEN BCU SOGS SMRA BA RGYA MTSAN BKRA SHIS GNYIS KYIS NAN CHER BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ,SDE SNOD GSUM DANG RGYUD SDE BZHED DA SGRA CHING SOGS KYI SGO NAS RANG GZHAN GYI GRUB MTHA' RGYA MTSO'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I DGE SLONG MANG DU THOS PA 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES BRIS, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS KUN TU RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
